ovdesc.p: Application to define the accounting frequency for subtypes of different companies.

desc.p: This field provides the option to update IFRS.ACCOUNTING.DETAILS.
Value "YES" indicates the system should update IFRS.ACCOUNTING.DETAILS.
Value "NO" indicates the system should not update IFRS.ACCOUNTING.DETAILS.
This field denotes the frequency at which the specified SUB.TYPE will be processed.
This field will provide a meaningful description for the accrual param
The ID of the IFRS.ACCRUAL.PARAM will be company specific.
A valid IFRS.SUB.TYPE needs to be entered here.
The value can be IFRS.SUB.TYPE (Meant for FAIRVALUE/AMORTIZED and they are supposed to be same). Or IFRS.SUB.TYPE.ID-DISCLOSURE because ASSET.TYPES such as DISCLOSURE can have a different frequency.
For Impairment processing, IFRS.SUB.TYPE.ID-IMPAIR is allowed to do the impairment processing.
Also we allow DEFAULT-DISCLOSURE and DEFAULT-IMPAIR, which means the date is applicable for all the IFRS.SUB.TYPE. Frequency defined at DEFAULT level overrides the date at IFRS.SUB.TYPE level
